Package zad

Class CardSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • zad.CardSet
  • public class CardSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Deck creation method, uses unicode card characters as card colors. possibility to create decks with multiple card sets, with or without jokers. Jokers are set to be 2 per card set.
    Author:
    kiszkot

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CardSet​(boolean jokers)
      Creates a deck of one 52 or 54 card set.
      CardSet​(int sets, boolean jokers)
      Creates a deck of given card sets; Possibility to add jokers same as in main constructor CardSet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Card drawCard()
      Draws a card from the deck.
      int getAvailableCards()
      Returns the number of available cards to draw in the deck
      int getTotalCards()
      Gets the total cards of the deck, differs from available cards.
      void peek()
      This is an easter egg, ignore
      void resetSet()
      Reorders the set as in original creation and resets available cards to draw
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the current available cards in the deck
      Card[] toCardArray()
      Converts the deck to a Card array
      java.lang.String toString()
      For debugging purposes

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

               boolean jokers)
        Creates a deck of given card sets; Possibility to add jokers same as in main constructor CardSet

        jokers - boolean TRUE for jokers, FALSE for no jokers
